title: How to Download and Install a Game on the Xbox 360

steps.title: Power up your Xbox 360 and sign in.
steps.content: Power up your Xbox 360 and sign in. If your Xbox does not automatically sign into Xbox Live, use your game controller arrow buttons to arrow over to the center block. Pressing A selects that box and will sign you into Xbox Live. If you haven’t already, sign up for Xbox Live—a free membership service is sufficient to access downloadable games.

steps.title: Arrow up until you see the “Home” category highlighted.
steps.content: Arrow up until you see the “Home” category highlighted. Then arrow to the right until "Games" is highlighted. Arrow down twice to highlight "Games Marketplace" and press A . This will open the Games Marketplace and the main dashboard for accessing game content on Xbox Live.

steps.title: Arrow through categories until you find a game or demo.
steps.content: Arrow through categories until you find a game or demo. The dashboard will direct you to new games, demos, and add-ons that are popular right now. You can arrow through the different categories until you find what you want to download. If you know what content you want to download, hit Y to enter the search feature. By navigating back and forth through the alphabet and selecting letters (with A ), you can search for the game you're looking for. Each letter will further narrow down your search.

steps.title: Use the arrow pad to highlight the game and A to select it.
steps.content: Use the arrow pad to highlight the game and A to select it. This will open the download screen. Arrow to "Confirm Download" and select with A . Do not turn your Xbox off while the file is downloading. Xbox will alert you when it’s finished.

steps.title: Press the center “Guide” button and select Xbox Home.
steps.content: Press the center “Guide” button and select Xbox Home. Alternatively, press B repeatedly to access your home screen. Then, arrow back to the Games menu and select "My Games”—your new game will be waiting for you in that menu!
